await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(500); ff14bot.Managers.MovementManager.MoveForwardStart(); await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(2000); ff14bot.Managers.MovementManager.MoveForwardStop(); await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(10000);

SpellData data; if(ActionManager.CurrentActions.TryGetValue("Quit", out data)) { await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(500); ff14bot.Managers.ActionManager.DoAction(299, Core.Player); await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(2000); }

var result=true; if (MovementManager.IsFlying){result = await CommonTasks.Land(); await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(1000);} if (result && Core.Player.IsMounted) {ActionManager.Dismount();await Buddy.Coroutines.Coroutine.Sleep(2000);}
